text: name is ademola Bashir I work as
technical customer support associate my
role with Amazon web services is working
together with a lot of customers a lot
of companies what we do basically is
make sure for them to have a good
experience with Amazon I deal with
everybody all over the world sometimes I
wake up and then I get an email from
someone who's in Hong Kong sometimes
again and it's beautiful because you as
a person you come in and you work with
all kinds of people exposes you to
culture exposes you to opinions of other
people and it makes you a better human
being
the reason why I enjoy working at tws is
because AWS treats both the staffs and
the customers at the same so they're
obsessed with the staffs as well always
thinking about the staff asking
questions how can we be better for you
we have periodic events where we go out
together as a team and interact and this
for me has helped me a lot in meeting
and bonding with my teammates you will
never alone at AWS there's always
support you could come in blank and then
you're going to get all the support you
that you need to to Excel on the jobs
the work environment is very encouraging
and and also it's very inspiring as well
because everybody's cheering you up and
everybody's supporting you and you also
know that there's an opportunity for you
to grow over a short period of time to
become anything you want to be who
doesn't want to work for an AWS for sure
